_comment: REVIEWS DATABASE - Edit this file to manage reviews

_instructions.how_to_add_position: Change 'position': null to 'position': 'Coach at Blau Weiss Berlin'
_instructions.how_to_feature: Change 'featured': false to 'featured': true (review will appear in carousel)
_instructions.how_to_delete: Delete the entire review object from the array
_instructions.featured_reviews: Only reviews with 'featured': true appear in the carousel at top of page
_instructions.all_reviews: All reviews appear in the grid below carousel, newest first

reviews.name: Anonymous
reviews.text: Great photographer, been an absolute blast working with him. Really great at communication and keeps the shoot fun and friendly.

reviews.name: Divyansh Chawla
reviews.text: Arpith is a great photographer with an outstanding editing skills. He can capture rare moments like no one I know of. He also clicked some of my portraits which i liked so much that i posted on instagram. I really recommend him as other than his skills, he has a great personality.

reviews.name: Abhishek
reviews.text: Had a him shoot my car before he moved to Germany. Loved the results. Absolutely recommend.
